duties_responsibilities.duty: Ensure leading brands like Oreo, Ritz, Belvita, Chips Ahoy, Triscuit, among others, are well represented, stocked, and maintained on shelf and displays.
Follow the daily route plan prepared by the operations team to ensure the most efficient in-store service.
Work closely with sales representatives to optimize visibility of Mondelēz products on shelves and the construction of promotional displays.
Enhance seasonal sales, seasonal displays, and new product launches.
Maintain a professional, positive, and upbeat attitude while representing Mondelēz in-store.
